title: Matching (1 point each)
instructions: Select the correct answer from the dropdown.

prompts.question: A common element of all games attempting to recreate/simulate a subset of reality, and allows fantasy of the player to fill in the rest.
A type of fun representing the relationship between player’s ability and difficulty?
A type of fun representing player’s ability to make choices showcasing their creativity or individuality?
Other players, enemies, game environment, time are what common element and fundamental characteristic of a game.
Games go further in representing reality/fantasy than movies because they are ___?
